mapper.insert: insert into fy_address(address_name, goods_taker, tel,created_user_id, create_time) values (#{addressName}, #{goodsTaker}, #{tel}, #{createdUserId}, #{createTime});

insert into fy_order(order_id, buy_user_id, buy_user_name, sell_item_id, sell_user_id, sell_user_name, create_time,pay_price) values (#{orderId}, #{buyUserId}, #{buyUserName}, #{sellItemId}, #{sellUserId}, #{sellUserName}, #{createTime}, #{payPrice})
